Package org.smartfrog.services.xml.utils

Interface Summary
XmlConstants General definition of various XML constants, usually parser options but also classnames and things.
 

Class Summary
DomToXom Convert from Dom to Xom, using a builder of choice.
ParserHelper XML support.
ResourceLoader This is something that can hand off resource loading to whatever does loading.
XmlCatalogResolver This class handles resolution for Sax and Dom Parsers.
XomUtils Generic static Xom utils; all java1.4+ The class has a protected constructor to allow direct subclasses
XsdUtils XML Schema helper stuff created 26-May-2005 15:35:48
